heading: Diablo 4â€™s First Expansion Vessel of Hatred
content: During the BlizzCon 2023 introduced the first expansion for Diablo 4: Blizzard dropped a tantalizing teaser promising an expanded story, new evils to slay, a jungle zone to explore, and brand new class to play! Diablo 4's first expansion Vessel of Hatred releases next year. It focuses on expanding the story of Travel to the lush jungle of Torajan, (known to the locals as Nahantu). The jungle hides new ways to play, new evils to slay, and a never before seen in the Diablo universe! Stay tuned for more information on during Summer 2024. Many members of the are attending BlizzCon 2023 so feel free to say hello if you see a familiar face. As Season 2 continues we'll be making adjustments to our builds, guides and resources so stay tuned. With that said, head over to our and select the to stay up to date with our content development to make the most of your Season 2 experience! Written by:
